creditline: Gift of Libby and Bill Clark in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: seated man at right, with a thin beard and moustache, wearing a black hat, holding a small gourd in his PR hand; small mule in LLC; some sketchy blossoms and light grey wide brushstrokes at top of image
marks: Signature and Seal 雅邦筆 {Gahō hitsu}
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and gold color on silk
title: Chōkarō Sennin Releasing His Mule from a Gourd
